Item.Name: LocalizableStrings.BOOLEAN2d1b13ce4576430b8575add267cc7d78Tip.Value
Item.Value: Cashless settlement for the sender or receiver is available only if the contract is signed.

Item.Name: LocalizableStrings.DATETIME520ebdd5af544aac95a15c8ae46d8a11Tip.Value
Item.Value: The actual shipment creation date is set by default. If the shipment will be made later than the date of creation of the EN, indicate the actual date of shipment

Item.Name: LocalizableStrings.FLOAT2711ba2c9dcd4d73b96c992ea85a640bTip.Value
Item.Value: The volumetric weight is calculated by the formula (Length × Width × Height, cm) / 4000 and compared with the actual weight. The larger indicator is used in calculations of the cost of transportation.

Item.Name: LocalizableStrings.LOOKUPb8aa2f8589764896bd2687defdee3922Tip.Value
Item.Value: 1 The sender has independently created this invoice, but has not yet provided it for shipment _________________________________________________________________ 2 Deleted _________________________________________________________________ 3 Number not found _________________________________________________________________ 4 Departure in the city of XXXX. (The status for interregional ones has been sent) _________________________________________________________________ 41 Departure in the city of XXXX. (Status for local standard and local express services - delivery within the city limits) _________________________________________________________________ 5 The shipment is headed to YYYY _________________________________________________________________ 6 Departure in city YYYY, estimated delivery to BRANCH-XXX dd-mm. Wait for further notice of arrival _________________________________________________________________ 7 Arrived at the department _________________________________________________________________ 8 Arrived at the branch (downloaded to the Post Office) _________________________________________________________________ 9 Shipment received _________________________________________________________________ 10 Shipment received %DateReceived%. Within a day, you will receive an SMS notification about the receipt of the money transfer and you can collect it at the cash desk of the "Nova Poshta" branch _________________________________________________________________ 11 Shipment received %DateReceived%. The money order has been issued to the recipient. _________________________________________________________________ 12 Nova Poshta completes your shipment _________________________________________________________________ 101 On the way to the recipient _________________________________________________________________ 102 Refusal of receipt (The sender has created a return order) _________________________________________________________________ 103 Recipient refusal (recipient refused to send) _________________________________________________________________ 104 Changed address _________________________________________________________________ 105 Storage stopped _________________________________________________________________ 106 Received and created a return delivery invoice _________________________________________________________________ 111 Unsuccessful delivery attempt due to the absence of the Recipient at the address or communication with him _________________________________________________________________ 112 The delivery date has been moved by the Recipient _________________________________________________________________
